data.title: Go With the Grain
data.constraints: There will only be one fissure line.
data.stubGenerator:
loop 6 read LINE:word(6)

write Vertical,Horizontal,NE-SW Diagonal,NW-SE Diagonal
data.inputDescription: << 6 lines >> a string of 6 characters representing a row of grain pattern.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are chopping a block of wood 6" X 6".
Each square inch has a dominant grain pattern. either Horizontal -, Vertical |, NE-SW Diagonal /, or NW-SE Diagonal \, your goal is to find a fissure line where you could place an axe to the most effect.
( a fissure line is when there is a solid line of a dominant grain patter going through the whole block. (it must pass through 6 squares!) like this:
///|//
///|//
///|//
///|//
///|//
///|//
   ^ ->> there is the fissure line, it is Vertical





   

      
Input

      
 6 lines  a string of 6 characters representing a row of grain pattern.

   

   

      
Output

      
a string from Vertical, Horizontal, NE-SW Diagonal, NW-SE Diagonal

   

   

      
Constraints

      
There will only be one fissure line.

   

   

      
Example

      

         

            
Input

            
|||||/
||||/|
|||/||
||/|||
|/||||
/|||||

         

         

            
Output

            
NE-SW Diagonal
